main event: Unidentified flying objects resembling flak bursts were observed near Narsarssuak AFB, Greenland on 23 July 1954.
interesting points: The objects usually appeared in pairs and formed in three seconds, disappearing in twelve seconds., Radar estimated the altitude of the objects at approximately 6,000 feet., Three aircraft were dispatched to observe the shifts and noted approximately 10 grey-colored objects similar to flak bursts., Weather conditions were noted to be excellent for observation during the event., The phenomenon was evaluated as flak by the military.
